subject: Order Status
description_text:
﻿.

Hi:
Just following up my order placed on December 1st. Order # SSN4238, it’s a Christmas present for my son.

Thanks.

Juan J. Aguilar Toledo
Sent from Juan José iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Juan Jose Aguilar,     We apologize for the delay. Unfortunately, we are unable to ship the package to Puerto Rico because the steering wheel exceeds size restrictions, and we do not have this product in stock at our U.S. warehouse. We will cancel your order. We're sorry!
